resource: 1002069.vtc=true 1002069.description=Maximum operation duration of this system is ten minutes. System may not operate if the hybrid battery is under load or if the battery charge is low. While plugged in, this system operates using power from grid. See your Owner's Manual for further information. 1002069.derived=false 1002069.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002069.1002622.1000861.title=
